snippet.title: CoasterMania - Official Trailer | Upload VR Showcase
snippet.description: Watch the trailer for CoasterMania to see how you can build cute environments, like a space-themed one and more. The trailer also showcases various features of the game, including a campaign mode, 50+ puzzles, how you can build and share levels, and community levels. CoasterMania will be available in Fall 2024 on the Meta Quest Store, and it is available in Early Access now on App Lab.
